official_title: A bill entitled: the "Mandatory Fish Inspection Act of 1985".

summary.text: Mandatory Fish Inspection Act of 1985 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to initiate, within one year of enactment of this Act, a mandatory program for the inspection of the commercial processing of fish, shellfish, and their products used for human consumption.

titles.title: A bill entitled: the "Mandatory Fish Inspection Act of 1985".
